Instance.description: Tuning specific to a decorator career gig. These are career events which gives the sim pay if they complete it.

TunableVariant.name: _decorator_gig_tuning
TunableVariant.description: Tuning specific to decorator gigs. Leave un-tuned if this gig is not a decorator one.

Tunable.name: base_score
Tunable.description: Base score to which we will apply all the modifiers and then use to get a gig result.

Tunable.name: budget_over_score
Tunable.description: Score for going over budget used.

TunableList.name: budget_scoring
TunableList.description: List of [+/-min %, +/-max %, score] to score the amount of budget used.

Tunable.name: max
Tunable.description: Max percentage of budget used.

Tunable.name: min
Tunable.description: Min percentage of budget used.

Tunable.name: score
Tunable.description: Score for the percentage of budget used.

TunableVariant.name: current_client_rel_bit
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, this rel bit will be applied on the client.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Rel bit to apply.

TunableVariant.name: commercial_venue_zone
TunableVariant.description: The commercial zone type for this gig . The decorator Sim will automatically travel to this zone at the beginning of the work shift.

TunableTuple.name: career_customer_lot
TunableTuple.description: Require career event zone to be the Customer's household for the tuned Career.

Tunable.name: career
Tunable.description: The career used to look up the client's lot.

TunableTuple.name: home_zone
TunableTuple.description: Require career event zone to be the Sim's home zone.

TunableTuple.name: lot_description
TunableTuple.description: Specify the required career event zone by lot description.

TunableVariant.name: house_description
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, this house description will be used for this career event. For example, for the acting career loads into the same lot but different houses (studio sets).

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: House description used for this career event.

Tunable.name: lot_description
Tunable.description: Lot description of required zone.

TunableTuple.name: random_lot
TunableTuple.description: Travel to a random zone, with weighting according to the tuning.

TunableVariant.name: household_weighting
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, and a household lives in the zone, calculated weight will be multiplied by the 0-1 score returned by a household sim filter tested against the household.

Tunable.name: blacklist_filter
Tunable.description: Specifies the blacklist filter for the household filter. Uses 1- score of highest scoring sim in household using this filter to modify the calculated base score. If highest score is 1, then the weight modifier will be 0 and zone will be ineligible.

Tunable.name: primary_filter
Tunable.description: Filter used to determine the base score of the household using the sim that scores the highest. If Highest score is 0, then the weight modifier will be 0, and zone will be ineligible.

TunableList.name: random_weight_terms
TunableList.description: A list of tests to use and the weights to add for each test. By default, zones start with a weight of 1.0 and this can be increased through these tests.

Tunable.name: negate
Tunable.description: If checked, extra weight will be applied to zones that do NOT pass this test, instead of zones that do pass.

TunableTuple.name: belongs_to_active_player
TunableTuple.description: A zone test to check if the zone belongs to the active player.

TunableTuple.name: has_zone_modifiers
TunableTuple.description: A zone test for a specific modifier on the zone.

TunableList.name: blacklist_zone_modifiers
TunableList.description: A zone cannot have the selected number of modifiers to pass this test.

Tunable.name: num_blacklist_allowed
Tunable.description: The threshold of blacklist modifiers owned by the zone that will trigger a test failure.

Tunable.name: num_whitelist_required
Tunable.description: The number of whitelist modifiers that the zone is required to have in order to pass this test.

TunableList.name: whitelist_zone_modifiers
TunableList.description: A zone must have the selected number of these modifiers to pass this test..

TunableTuple.name: is_active_zone
TunableTuple.description: A zone test to check if the zone is currently the active zone.

TunableTuple.name: is_npc_household
TunableTuple.description: A zone test to check if the zone belongs to an NPC household.

TunableTuple.name: is_owned_by_any_household
TunableTuple.description: A zone test to check if the zone is owned by any household.

TunableTuple.name: is_plex
TunableTuple.description: A zone test to check if the zone is a plex.

TunableTuple.name: venue_type
TunableTuple.description: A zone test for a specific list of venue types.

TunableList.name: venues
TunableList.description: If the venue is in this list, the test passes.

Tunable.name: add_weight
Tunable.description: The amount of extra weight to add to the probability of zones that pass this test.

TunableEnum.name: decorator_gig_lot_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of lot for this decorator gig this is.

TunableEnum.name: decorator_gig_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of decorator gig this is.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to associate with type of decorator gig.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name to associate with type of decorator gig.

TunableEnum.name: dependent_situation_tag
TunableEnum.description: Any situation running on the owner of this gig when this gig is cleaned up will be destroyed. Use this to cleanup decorator related situations that are not directly tied to this gig's career event.

Tunable.name: gig_budget_modulo
Tunable.description: Number to use to apply a modulo operation to the random budget created from the range so it looks like a real budget.

TunableTuple.name: gig_budget_range
TunableTuple.description: Indicates the amount of simoleons the player has to work with to complete the decoration. We will choose a random number from it at the moment of creating the gig.

Tunable.name: max
Tunable.description: Max for budget.

Tunable.name: min
Tunable.description: Min for budget.

TunableVariant.name: gig_short_title
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the string used as the project title in gig history.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TunableVariant.name: individual_gig_score_stat
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, creates statistic used to apply individual gig score to clients.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Statistic used to apply individual gig score to clients.

TunableEnum.description: Any object bought through BB will get this tag applied to it any time the Customer's lot is loaded while this Gig is active. These tags do not persist through save/load.

Tunable.name: picker_localization_rarity
Tunable.description: The string to show the gig pay on the picker.

Tunable.name: picker_localization_second_rarity
Tunable.description: The string to show the gig budget on the picker.

TunableList.name: preference_scoring_weight
TunableList.description: List of [trait_type, weight] used to weight each hit on the gig preferences list. trait_type in this case will be Like or Dislike.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The relative weight of this trait.

Tunable.name: preferences_number
Tunable.description: Number of preferences for this gig.

TunableVariant.name: restricted_to_level
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the decorator sim will only be allowed to modify the tuned level of the customer's lot.

TunableVariant.name: Restricted_To_Level
TunableVariant.description: Number of the level the decorations are restricted to. 0 is the ground floor, 1 is the second floor, -1 is the basement, etc.

TunableTuple.name: bottom_floor
TunableTuple.description: Used when the gig wants to add a new floor at the lowest basement level.

TunableTuple.name: specific_floor
TunableTuple.description: Specify a floor for this gig.

Tunable.name: floor
Tunable.description: The floor for this gig. 0 is the ground floor, 1 is the second floor, -1 is the first basement floor, etc.

TunableTuple.name: top_floor
TunableTuple.description: Used when the gig wants to add a new floor at the top-most level.

TunableList.name: scoring_results
TunableList.description: Gig Result based on final score

Tunable.name: max
Tunable.description: Max of the score range for this result.

Tunable.name: min
Tunable.description: Min of the score range for this result.

TunableEnum.name: result_type
TunableEnum.description: The GigResult enum that represents the outcome of the Gig.

TunableVariant.name: tiles_number_restriction
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the decorator sim will only be able to modify the tile count of the customer's lot by the tuned amount.

Tunable.name: Restricted_To_Tile_Count
Tunable.description: Indicates the number of tiles the player is allowed to add to the lot for this gig. 0 means the player can't add any tiles.

TunableVariant.name: gig_assignment_aspiration
TunableVariant.description: An aspiration to use as the assignment for this gig. The objectives of this aspiration

Tunable.name: gig_picker_localization_format
Tunable.description: String used to format the description in the gig picker.
